goal.en:
To teach students in giving advanced scientific oral presentations in English about a preselected topic related to their own PhD work.
The seminar is aimed to enable student to present a condensed oral presentations on international conferences within 15 to 20 minutes.
Secondly Students are requested to contribute to the following discussion section.
Speakers need to be able to answer to questions on a qualified level.

content.en:
Depending on the number of attending students we aspire to let each student give two oral presentations per course in two cycles.
Scores will be given according to their performances.
In addition the total score will be judged from the number of questions in the discussion session of each individual student.

en.competency: Be equipped with expertise in specific research disciplines.
Be capable of planning and performing research activity and summarizing results in a published form in the end.
Be initiative to interact with others with different backgrounds and coordinate effort to overcome obstacles.
Be able to communicate with foreigners effectively.
en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Attendance/Performance ， Self Assessment/ Peer Assessment

en.competency: Be self-driven constantly to explore science.

與不同研究領域人員協調以解決化學課題
具足夠的外語能力可有效的與外籍人士溝通
